charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Mai
watching over Munchlax as he was eating.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_0400_1:
Actually, these are food scraps restaurants
planned to throw away.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_0600_1:
He won’t get sick from this. Munchlax may
have insatiable appetites, but they’ve got
robust stomachs.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_0700_1:
Back in Hisui, he’d even gobble up all the
food scraps intended for compost!
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_0800_1:
Even after coming to Pasio, he’s still always
hungry, and I think some people noticed...
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_0900_1:
’Cause a bunch of the restaurant staff
around here adore him and started giving
him their leftovers and scraps.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1000_1:
Ever since, we’ve made sure to pass by here
whenever we go for a walk.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1100_1:
I do feel a little bad, though, since they’re
always giving us stuff.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1200_1:
Looks like you finished everything today,
as usual! Good job!
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1300_1: He seems pretty pleased and full now.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_0401_1500_1:
Well, we’ve spent a lot of time together,
helping each other out.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_0302_1600_1:
You can really tell what Munchlax is
feeling!
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_0402_1700_1: Of course! I can read Munchlax like a book!
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1800_1:
He’s been my partner for years, and we
grew up together, so he’s like a brother
to me.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_1900_1:
Back in Hisui, he always fought by my side,
and we never needed a Poké Ball, either.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2000_1: But...Pasio does have its own rules.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2100_1:
I’ve learned from Adaman and Irida how to
become a sync pair and get Munchlax into
a Poké Ball.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2200_1:
Back in Hisui, I couldn’t really accept the
Galaxy Expedition Team’s way of using
Poké Balls...
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2300_1:
But it was nice to see Rei and his Pokémon
fighting so well together, as if they were
one—like the legendary hero of old.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2400_1:
Now in this era, time has passed, and the
relationship between people and Pokémon
has changed.
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2500_1:
Munchlax and I will strengthen our bond
by using Poké Balls...
charaepi_ch0311_00_yone/2301_1201_2600_1:
and aim to be a great sync pair, just like Rei
and everyone else!
